overview: Andrew Carricarte is currently President, CEO of IOS Health Systems, a leading provider of web-based electronic health systems. IOS offers a suite of easy-to-use solutions that include the innovative Medios EHR (Electronic Health Records), Medios PMS (Practice Management System), and Medios Enterprise systems. They enable physicians to better manage their practices by applying powerful technology that results in a better quality of life and improved patient care. “Taking Care of Those Who Give Care”
